parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: The IP address or hostname of the ZoneMinder Server

parameter.name: protocol
parameter.label: Protocol
parameter.description: Protocol to connect to the ZoneMinder Server API (http or https)

parameter.name: urlpath
parameter.label: Additional path on ZoneMinder Server to access API
parameter.description: Additional path on ZoneMinder Server to access API. In a standard installation this is' /zm'

parameter.name: user
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: User to access the ZoneMinder Server API

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password to access the ZoneMinder Server API

parameter.name: http_port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Port of the ZoneMinder Server API. If '0', then the port will be determined from the protocol

parameter.name: telnet_port
parameter.label: Telnet Port
parameter.description: Port to listen for events in (Telnet)

parameter.name: refresh_interval
parameter.label: API Polling interval
parameter.description: Seconds between each call to ZoneMinder Server API to refresh values in openHAB

parameter.name: refresh_interval_disk_usage
parameter.label: Refresh Interval for Disk Usage
parameter.description: Minutes between each call to ZoneMinder Server to refresh Server DiskUsage in ZoneMinder. Default value is '0' (Disabled)

parameter.name: autodiscover_things
parameter.label: Background discovery
parameter.description: If enabled new monitors on the ZoneMinder Server will automatically be added to the Inbox in openHAB
